Method Detail

getSpecificBuild

public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getSpecificBuild(java.lang.String URL,
                                                               java.lang.String project,
                                                               java.lang.String specificBuild,
                                                               java.lang.String proxyHost,
                                                               java.lang.String proxyPort)
Take access to the URL informed by the user, selects the project that has the build to download, with the objective of identify the valid and available builds.
Identify and return a specific build required.

Parameters:
URL - - address containing the direct link to the page with the builds to download.
specificBuild - - string containing the build number required.
project - - project name (i.e. Yeti1.10).
proxyHost - - proxy host (optional)
proxyPort - - proxy port (optional)
Returns:
LinkedList String list containing the files information of the build specified.

getLatestBuild

public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getLatestBuild(java.lang.String URL,
                                                             java.lang.String project,
                                                             java.lang.String proxyHost,
                                                             java.lang.String proxyPort)
Take access to the URL informed by the user, selects the project that has the build to download with the objective of identify the valid and available builds.
Identify and return the latest build found.

Parameters:
URL - - address containing the direct link to the page with the builds to download.
project - - project name (i.e. Yeti1.10).
proxyHost - - proxy host (optional)
proxyPort - - proxy port (optional)
Returns:
LinkedList String list containing the files informations of the last valid and available build.

getLog

public java.lang.String getLog()
Return the saved information during the build search to be writed in the log file.

Returns:
String containing the build search results.

getBuildNumber

public java.lang.String getBuildNumber()
Return the build number information.

Returns:
string containing the build number found.

formatBuildNumber

public java.lang.String formatBuildNumber(java.lang.String build)
Get the string containing the buid link and change the format to identify the correct build number.

Parameters:
build - Example = 04/09/2008 10:18:58 (1.10.0.276)
Returns:
Example = 1.10.0.276

getURLPath

public java.lang.String getURLPath()
Return the URL path to the files.

Returns:
path to the files where the files of the build identified are found.

isIdentified

public boolean isIdentified()
Return the build identification result.

Returns:
false if cannot identify build | true if the build was identified correctly
